_header: I warn each lede that liveth in land
_description: Keep Well Christ’s Commandments — thirteen 8-line stanzas with refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
I Warne vche leod þat liueþ in londeAnd do hem dredles
                    out of were…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor þi I preye þat crist vs spedeKuyndely to kepe
                    his comaundement
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
I warne euery man þat lyvith in londAnd do hym dredles oute of
                    were…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…That god commaundith to all menWho so will to hevyn
                    goKepe þem all breke noan of þo
CamMagPep1584.Note: 36 lines in a variety of verse and rhyme forms.
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title:
The x commaundementis (f. 104v, where RT usually
                    written)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
I warne vch leod þat lyueþ in londeAnd do hem dredles out
                    of were…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þis lesson lerneþ alle at meHo seiþ þe
                    soþe he schal be schent
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Explicit A song ho seiþ þe soþe he schal be schent
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLHar78.First Lines:
…To kepe well Crystes ComaundementThowe schalt haue o god and
                    no moo…
BLHar78.Last Lines:
…Þi neybure wylfuly þu ne dereÞe none þat
                    Comyth the besyde…

Lam853.First Lines:
I Warne eche lijf þat liueþ in londAnd do him dredlees
                    out of wereÞat he must studie & vndirstondeÞe lawe of
                    god to loue & lere…
Lam853.Last Lines:
…ffor crist wole him heere help at nedeffor from hens to
                    heuene he wole him hentffor þi priere we þat crist us
                    spedeKindeli to kepe his comaundementAmen
Lam853.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Hymns to the Virgin and Christ…and other religious poems.
